name: Watch Your Step (red-stake)
description:
Shoot your way to a personal best survival time.

Install:
Unzip the .zip file (right click and select "Extract All...") and run the .exe to play

Controls:
WSD - Move
LMB - Shoot
R - Start

Development Info:
Engine - GameMaker
Sprites - GM Sprite Editor
SFX - sfxia
Music - SOUNDRAW
